name: Thermonuclear
description:
A mega-corporation has revitalized the development of its long-banned 'Allfather' AI technology, thus indirectly provoking the start of the Third World War. 'Thermonuclear' is the name of the most enhance cyborg ever created, the ultimate weapon your side will use to deal with its opponents. The enemy you will have to face yields yet unmatched power. Complete strategically significant tasks, advance your cyborg, unlock new skills and artifacts — only this way you'll be able to defeat the Allfather and end the war.

Key Features:

* Be aware of your surroundings: Base your attack plans on the peculiarities of the terrain or the environment. Push your enemy off a ledge, ignite the grass or put out your character by diving into a puddle. Blow up explosive barrels or slide on ice in order to save the Action Points.


* Various builds: Combine four different types of skills, artefacts, consumables and scars in order to complete miscellaneous missions and tasks. Find the middle ground between your versatile abilities apt for dealing with every enemy and special tools against specific foes.


* Procedurally generated levels: Complete missions in four unique locations scattered across the world packed with all kinds of enemies. From ruins of what used to a city filled to their brim with heinous mutants to a military factory, guarded by soldiers and robots. Different skills and abilities are needed at each location.
